arabic.title: بنت بلادي
text: شمس طالعة لكن ولا ليها غروب
عشق تاني تاني غير كل إحساس
أي وصف سمعته عنها برضو قليل
أنا كدة حاسس إني مسكت النور
خايف على عمري لو ثانية يفوت

english.title: Daughter of My Country
text: I'm neither calling nor loving either this
or that, from this night on
I've chosen the daughter of my country
with my soul, with my heart, with my eye I melt
I'd give up on myself but I'd never give up on her
are a sun that rises with no sunset
she decorates the gold and diamonds
better than the angels, the ginies or the humans
I loved her and fell for her
another kind of love than all people came to me
I'm neither calling nor loving either this
or that, from this night on
I've chosen the daughter of my country
the moon of the night and her eyes are like sisters
when she walks all the pretty ones get jealous
with her charm and her scents
she has a tenderness of a child and the highness of queens
the whole world tilts with her look
she removes the morning and brings the night
in her figure and her waist
any discription I've heard is still very little
I'm neither calling nor loving either this
or that, from this night on
I've chosen the daughter of my country
ever since she was born she's been living in castles
I knew her, I touched her
I feel as if i touched the light
she talks to me with all the silence
she made me love her to death
ever since the day I saw her
I'm afraid for my life that it'd would pass
I'm neither calling nor loving either this
or that, from this night on
I've chosen the daughter of my country

arabic.title: حبيتك قوي
text: خلاني اعلق نفسي بيك بالشكل ده
ندمان على الي راح من عمري
وده اول حب في عمري بحس بيه
وده اخر حب في عمري بعيش عليه
او كلمة حلوة من شفايفك قلتها
ان انت اجمل ما في حياتي كله

english.title: I LOVED YOU ALOT
text: what's the thing in you that bring me close to you that made me crazy about you
what'swith your love god how sweet is it ,in my life it never came to my mind to live for somone else
i feel sorry for the days that pass before ,thout you
you made me forget the world with you baby seenes the first timei saw you
i loved you alot and this is the first love that i feel
i loved you alot and this will be the last love for me
how many yearspassed i don't know how did i live without you
mabey it's your eyes orthe touch of your hands or a nice word from your lips you said it
the same qoution same answer that your the most weet thing in my hole life (x2)
i feel sorry for the days that pass before without you
you made me forget the world with you baby seenes the frist time i saw you
i loved you alot and this is the First love for me
i loved you alot and this will be the last love for me
how many years passed i don't know how did i live without you

arabic.title: سحر عنيك
text: طول محنا مع بعض و سواى
نحلم و نعيش يا عمري بس لبعضنا

english.title: The Charm of Your Eyes
text: I loved your eyes and fell for them
and I found with you, my life
I love you forever, and years..
and years will pass with you
will be the years of the most beautiful love
we'll live the most beautiful life
as long as we're with each other together
I'm in love with the charm of your eyes
I'm melted, see for how many years
come closer, I need you here
don't you ever go away from me
next to you, my love, I missed you
I need your love and with you..
and with you, I'll stay with you
and till the end of our lives
we dream and live, my life
you and me just for each other
I'm yours and my life is sacreficed for you
I'm in love with the charm of your eyes
I'm melted, see for how many years
come closer, I need you here
don't you ever go away from me
I found heaven next to you
tell me what is the life worth?
I love you forever, and years..
and years will pass with you
will be the years of the most beautiful love
we'll live the most beautiful life
as long as we're with each other together
I'm in love with the charm of your eyes
I'm melted, see for how many years
come closer, I need you here
don't you ever go away from me

english.title: My Heart Called You
text: and my soul is in you
o love of my life, all my life
and you're the one whose love I love
that the most beautiful angel would be with it
and wished that you'd be with me
of longing and yearning I find you here with me
my love, my life is yours
if you were by my side with me always
yah, for a long time I've
needed a heart to feel me
and I'd feel it in return
and you're the one whose love I love
that the most beautiful angel would be with it
and wished that you'd be with me
of longing and yearning I find you here with me
my love, my life is yours
